item.title: Real Madrid vs Barcelona LIVE Score, Spanish Super Cup 2025 Final: Alejandro Balde Scores | Real Madrid 1-4 Barcelona - NDTV Sports
item.description:
Real Madrid vs Barcelona LIVE Updates, Spanish Super Cup 2025 Final

Date: January 15, 2025 Source: NDTV Sports

In a thrilling Spanish Super Cup final, Barcelona emerged victorious against Real Madrid with a stunning 5-2 win, showcasing their dominance in El Clasico.

  • Barcelona played with ten men but managed to secure a convincing victory.
  • This match marks a significant achievement for Barcelona in the 2025 season.
  • Real Madrid struggled to capitalize on their chances despite a strong start.
“This victory is a testament to our resilience and teamwork,” said Barcelona's manager after the match.

Barcelona's performance not only secures them the Super Cup title but also boosts their confidence moving forward in the season.

item.title: Real Madrid vs Barcelona Live Streaming Supercopa De Espana Final Live Telecast: When And Where To Watch - NDTV Sports
item.description:
Real Madrid vs Barcelona Live Streaming Supercopa De Espana Final Live Telecast: When And Where To Watch

Date: January 11, 2025

Source: NDTV

The Supercopa de Espana final is set for an exciting clash between FC Barcelona and Real Madrid, marking the third consecutive year these teams face off in this prestigious tournament.

  • Barcelona defeated Athletic Bilbao 2-0 to reach the final.
  • Real Madrid bested Mallorca 3-0 in their semi-final matchup.
  • The match will take place on January 13, 2025, at King Abdullah Sport City, Jeddah, Saudi Arabia.
  • Kick-off is scheduled for 12:30 AM IST on Monday.
  • No live television broadcast in India; streaming available on the FanCode app and website.

(All details are as per information provided by the broadcaster)

Fans eagerly anticipate this El Clasico showdown, with both teams vying for this significant trophy in the Spanish football calendar.

item.title: Real Madrid vs Barcelona Live streaming: 2025 Supercopa de Espana Final Live TV telecast, channel, time - myKhel
item.description:
Real Madrid vs Barcelona Live streaming: 2025 Supercopa de Espana Final Live TV telecast, channel, time

Published: Sunday, January 12, 2025, 23:30 [IST]

Real Madrid and Barcelona will face off in the Spanish Super Cup final at King Abdullah Sports City on Sunday late night. Los Blancos, fresh from a 3-0 semi-final win over Mallorca, seek their third trophy this season. La Blaugrana, aiming for their 15th Super Cup, defeated Athletic Bilbao 2-0 in their semi-final. Real Madrid holds a five-game winning streak, while Barcelona's recent form has dipped in La Liga.

Real Madrid vs Barcelona Match Details

  • Date: Monday, January 13, 2025
  • Time: 12:30 IST / 7:00 PM BST
  • Venue: King Abdullah Sports City, Jeddah, Saudi Arabia

Real Madrid vs Barcelona Live Streaming Details:

United Kingdom: Online Streaming: The UK viewers can watch the match through TNT Sports network from 7:00 PM BST.

United States: Online Streaming: The match will be telecast on ESPN and ESPN+ channel in the USA at 2:00 PM ET.

India: Online Streaming: The match will be streamed on FanCode website and app starting at 12:30 AM IST on January 13.

Nigeria: Online Streaming: The match will be telecast on the StarTimes network from 8:00 PM Nigeria time.

Indonesia: Online Streaming: The match will be live streamed on RCTI, iNews, MNC, and Sportstars networks from 2:00 AM Indonesia time.

Australia: Online Streaming: The match will begin from 6:00 AM Australia time on Monday.

UAE & Saudi Arabia: Online Streaming: The match will be shown live on Shahid sports network at 11:00 PM local time in UAE.

Pakistan: Online Streaming: The match will begin from 12:00 AM Pakistan time.

Bangladesh: Online Streaming: The match will begin from 1:00 AM Bangladesh time.

Nepal: Online Streaming: The match will begin from 12:45 AM Nepal time.

item.title: Karun Nair went six months without playing to becoming one of the top performers of the Vijay Hazare Trophy — now selectors are interested - The Indian Express
item.description:
Karun Nair went six months without playing to becoming one of the top performers of the Vijay Hazare Trophy — now selectors are interested

Publication Date: January 2025

Source: The Indian Express

Karun Nair, a notable figure in India's cricketing history, has successfully made a comeback after an extended break, emerging as a star in the ongoing Vijay Hazare Trophy.

After facing a long period without competitive play, Nair's recent performances have attracted attention from selectors as he showcases his skills and reliability.

  • Karun faced a six-month gap in competitive cricket during the 2022-2023 season.
  • He returned to form with four successive centuries in the Vijay Hazare Trophy.
  • Nair's latest score includes an unbeaten 122, helping Vidarbha reach the semi-finals.
  • His consistent performance has put him back on selectors' radar as India transitions its Test team.
  • Karun credits his return to focused training and support from his coach and team.
“For six-seven months, when I didn’t play any cricket, all I did was travel three hours a day just to have a net session.” - Karun Nair

Nair's return to form not only rejuvenates his cricketing career but also highlights the importance of perseverance and hard work in sports.

item.title: Punjab Kings Announce New Captain For IPL 2025: "We Had Identified..." - NDTV Sports
item.description:
Punjab Kings Announce New Captain For IPL 2025: "We Had Identified..."

Publication Date: November 26, 2024
Source: NDTV

The Punjab Kings have announced Shreyas Iyer as their new captain for the IPL 2025 season, a decision made public by Bollywood superstar Salman Khan on the reality show 'Bigg Boss'.

  • Shreyas Iyer expresses gratitude and aims to lead the team to its first title.
  • Head coach Ricky Ponting endorses Iyer's leadership capabilities.
  • Punjab Kings acquired Iyer for Rs 26.75 crore, making him one of the most expensive players in the auction.
  • The team aims to build a strong squad under new head coach Ricky Ponting.
“I am honoured that the team has reposed its faith in me.” - Shreyas Iyer

In conclusion, with Iyer's leadership and a well-structured squad, Punjab Kings are optimistic about their chances in the upcoming IPL season.

item.title: Shreyas Iyer appointed Punjab Kings captain for IPL 2025 - ESPNcricinfo
item.description:
Shreyas Iyer appointed Punjab Kings captain for IPL 2025

Date: Sunday, October 1, 2023

Source: ESPN Cricinfo

Shreyas Iyer, the second-most expensive player in the IPL 2025 auction, has been appointed the captain of Punjab Kings. The announcement was made during an episode of Big Boss.

  • Iyer secured a contract worth INR 26.75 crore (approximately USD 3.18 million).
  • Punjab Kings were the highest bidders for Iyer at the mega auction.
  • Iyer reunites with coach Ricky Ponting, who has expressed confidence in his leadership abilities.
  • Iyer was previously the captain of Kolkata Knight Riders, leading them to an IPL title in 2024.
“I am honoured that the team has reposed its faith in me. I hope to repay the faith shown by the management to deliver our maiden title.” - Shreyas Iyer

With strong support from Ponting, Iyer aims to lead Punjab Kings to their first IPL title, leveraging his experience in the league.

item.title: FA Cup 2025: Arsenal’s players wear all-white uniform against Man United, here’s why - Mint
item.description:
FA Cup 2025: Arsenal’s Players Don All-White Uniform Against Man United to Combat Youth Violence

Publication Date: January 8, 2025 | Source: AP

In an effort to raise awareness against knife crime and youth violence, Arsenal's players wore all-white uniforms during their FA Cup match against Manchester United.

  • Arsenal's “No More Red” campaign, launched in 2022, focuses on creating safe spaces for youth.
  • The all-white uniform symbolizes the club's commitment and is not available for purchase.
  • Freddie Hudson, head of Arsenal in the Community, emphasized the importance of trust and community engagement.
  • During the match, striker Gabriel Jesus was injured and carried off the field.
“It’s important we continue to invest in safe spaces where we engage young people facing multiple challenges as they navigate their way through their lives,” - Freddie Hudson.

This initiative highlights the club's ongoing social responsibility efforts while addressing pressing societal issues.

item.title: India my favourite vs Pakistan, Jasprit Bumrah's absence will be huge loss: Mohammad Amir opens up on ICC - The Times of India
item.description:
India my favourite vs Pakistan, Jasprit Bumrah's absence will be huge loss: Mohammad Amir opens up on ICC Champions Trophy 2025

Publication Date: Not provided Source: Not provided

In a recent interview, former Pakistani cricketer Mohammad Amir highlighted the significance of Jasprit Bumrah's absence from the ICC Champions Trophy 2025, believing it will pose a substantial loss for the Indian team.

  • Mohammad Amir emphasized that Bumrah is a key player for India.
  • He noted that matches between India and Pakistan are always thrilling.
  • The ICC Champions Trophy 2025 is highly anticipated by fans from both countries.
“Bumrah’s absence is a huge loss for India, especially in a tournament like the Champions Trophy.”

Amir underlined that while India has a strong lineup, Bumrah's skills as a bowler are irreplaceable. His absence could change the dynamics of the matches.

item.title: Dhanashree Verma shares pics with mother amid divorce rumours with Yuzvendra Chahal - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Dhanashree Verma shares pictures with mother amid divorce rumors with Yuzvendra Chahal

Date: Jan 12, 2025 | Source: Hindustan Times

Dhanashree Verma recently shared photos with her mother on Instagram amidst ongoing divorce rumors with cricketer Yuzvendra Chahal. Fans are curious whether she has returned to her family home due to marital troubles.

  • Dhanashree posted pictures on Instagram showing her with her mother.
  • Speculation arose regarding her relationship status with Yuzvendra Chahal due to the subdued expression in her photos.
  • Fans have commented on the situation, with some urging respect for their privacy.
  • Dhanashree and Yuzvendra got engaged in August 2020 and married in December of the same year.
  • Rumors of a troubled marriage began when the couple unfollowed each other on Instagram.
  • Dhanashree addressed the rumors indirectly, highlighting the negativity and trolling online.
Dhanashree: "The past few days have been incredibly tough for my family and me. What's truly upsetting is the baseless writing, devoid of fact-checking... My silence is not a sign of weakness; but of strength."

Her recent posts and the surrounding speculation continue to generate discussions among fans and followers regarding her marriage.

item.title: Fakhar Zaman Back As Pakistan Announce Preliminary Squad For Champions Trophy 2025 - OneCricket
item.description:
Fakhar Zaman Included As Pakistan Announce Preliminary Squad For Champions Trophy 2025

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Tribune

Pakistan have announced their preliminary squad for the upcoming Champions Trophy, featuring notable players including Fakhar Zaman, Babar Azam, and Shaheen Afridi.

  • The squad consists of 18 players, with a larger list submitted to the ICC.
  • Selectors are hopeful that Saim Ayub will recover in time for the tournament.
  • Shadab Khan is likely to miss the tournament as selectors prefer other bowlers.
  • The tournament kicks off for Pakistan against New Zealand on February 19, with a marquee match against India on February 23.

item.title: IPL begins March 21 weekend; WPL to start from February 7 - ESPNcricinfo
item.description:
IPL begins March 21 weekend; WPL to start from February 7

Publication date: Not specified Source: Not specified

The 2025 IPL is scheduled to commence on March 21, with Eden Gardens hosting both the tournament opener and the final on May 25. The 2025 WPL will take place from February 7 to March 2.

  • The IPL will have a two-week gap before starting, following the 2025 Champions Trophy final on March 9.
  • Eden Gardens, home of the Kolkata Knight Riders, will host the opener and final.
  • The 2025 season will consist of 74 matches, same as the last three seasons.
  • The WPL will be played in Mumbai, Bangalore, Baroda, and Lucknow.
“The full IPL schedule is expected to be out later this month.”

In conclusion, the announcements for both IPL and WPL set clear timelines for fans and franchises as preparations begin.

item.description:
Arsenal vs Manchester United Live Streaming FA Cup 2024-25 Live Telecast: When And Where To Watch

Date: January 12, 2025

Source: NDTV

Arsenal faces Manchester United in a crucial FA Cup third round match at Emirates Stadium, as both teams seek a much-needed victory.

  • The match takes place on January 12, 2025, at 8:30 PM IST.
  • It will be held at Emirates Stadium in London, England.
  • Live telecast available on Sony Sports Network.
  • Live streaming on the Sony LIV app and website.
  • Arsenal aims for cup success amid a poor league run, while United hopes to break a five-game winless streak.
“The only silverware of Arteta's Arsenal reign came with a record 14th FA Cup triumph in 2020.”

This encounter is significant as it showcases the historic rivalry between two of the FA Cup's most successful clubs.

item.title: Man City transfers: 'Special' player set to follow Walker out as Bundesliga side 'make contact' - Football365
item.description:
Man City Faces Player Departures as Bundesliga Teams Show Interest

Date: October 2023   |  Source: Football365

Pep Guardiola may lose another key player as James McAtee is set to follow Kyle Walker out of Manchester City, with Bundesliga clubs showing interest.

  • Kyle Walker has expressed a desire to leave, seeking opportunities abroad.
  • James McAtee, described as a “special” player, is being pursued by multiple clubs including those in the Bundesliga.
  • City is preparing for incoming transfers worth £150 million as they lose their young prospect.
  • RB Leipzig, Borussia Dortmund, and Bayer Leverkusen are interested in McAtee, with Mainz reported to make contact.
“He’s a special, talented player,” Guardiola stated, expressing his admiration for McAtee.

This potential loss of both players could significantly impact Manchester City's lineup, as they look to navigate upcoming challenges.

item.title: Never seen before, Yuvraj Singh father Yograj Singh hails MS Dhoni, He was fearless... - India.com
item.description:
Yograj Singh Praises MS Dhoni's Fearless Leadership

Publication Date: Date Not Specified

Source: India.com

Yograj Singh, father of cricketer Yuvraj Singh, has publicly praised MS Dhoni, noting his dynamic and fearless leadership style in a recent interview, marking a significant shift from his previous criticism.

  • Yograj Singh described Dhoni as a ‘dynamic’ and ‘fearless’ leader during a tribute.
  • He highlighted Dhoni's strategic acumen, particularly in reading the game, emphasizing his guidance to bowlers.
  • Yograj reflected on Dhoni’s impact on Indian cricket, notably during the 2007 T20 World Cup and 2011 ODI World Cup victories.
  • Dhoni's decision-making skills were exemplified by his promotion of Rohit Sharma during the 2013 Champions Trophy, which revolutionized Indian batting.
  • Yograj speculated that Yuvraj's career might have lasted longer without Dhoni's influence.
"MS Dhoni is the sixth-highest run-scorer in ODIs, with over 10,000 runs at an average of 50.23."

This praise signifies a reconciliatory gesture from Yograj, acknowledging Dhoni's pivotal role in shaping modern Indian cricket.
